https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kLEJX3LGpEVfmesLSVDrpZ4uOLS.jpg "Clapping for the Wrong Reasons" captures Glover as he walks around his L.A. mansion interacting with his various assortment of hanger-ons, including recording music with electronic musician/producer Flying Lotus and even "Boy Meets World" star Danielle Fishel, who is seen picking fruit out of a tree as she recounts a bizarre dream she had. Clapping for the Wrong Reasons
